member.name: T:Internal.Runtime.CompilerHelpers.LibraryInitializer
member.summary: Container class to run specific class constructors in a defined order. Since we can't directly invoke class constructors in C#, they're renamed Initialize.

member.name: F:Internal.Runtime.InteropDataConstants.HasMarshallers
member.summary: Flag set in RuntimeInteropData if the entry is for type with marshallers

member.name: F:Internal.Runtime.InteropDataConstants.HasInvalidLayout
member.summary: Flag set in RuntimeInteropData if the entry is for type with invalid interop layout

member.name: F:Internal.Runtime.InteropDataConstants.FieldCountShift
member.summary: Shift used to encode field count

member.name: F:Internal.Runtime.InteropDataConstants.HasDllImportSearchPath
member.summary: Flag set in ModuleFixupCell if DllImportSearchPath is specified for the DllImport.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.MissingInteropDataException
member.summary: Thrown when a manual marshalling method is called, but the type was not found by static analysis or in the rd.xml file.

member.name: P:System.SR.StructMarshalling_MissingInteropData
member.summary: {0} is missing structure marshalling data. To enable structure marshalling data, add a MarshalStructure directive to the application rd.xml file. For more information, please visit http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=393965

member.name: P:System.SR.DelegateMarshalling_MissingInteropData
member.summary: {0} is missing delegate marshalling data. To enable delegate marshalling data, add a MarshalDelegate directive to the application rd.xml file. For more information, please visit http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=393965

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_OffsetOfFieldNotFound
member.summary: Field passed in is not a marshaled member of the type '{0}'.
